data.title: Murata Manufacturing company profile
data.meta_description: In 2022 the revenue of Murata Manufacturing decreased by 6.9% from the previous year, after peaking in 2021. The company engages in the sector 'Electronic Components & Boards'.
data.text:
All companiesMurata Manufacturing

Murata Manufacturing

Murata Manufacturing was founded in 1944 and operates in Nagaokakyo, Japan. The company engages in the sector 'Electronic Components & Boards' (ISIC: 2610). The computer and electronic manufacturing industry is experiencing a period of growth thanks to an uptick in demand. This greater interest in electronics among consumers can be attributed to an increase in domestic income as well as the industry's new products and low prices.
